name: Timestudy Stopwatch
description: Simple, fast and lightweight Stopwatch for Industrial Engineering. Helpful to do timestudys in industrial environment. Great app to capture takt time and cycle time in a easy and fast way.  Real time output in different time formats: - minutes, seconds and milliseconds (mm:ss,ms) - Decimal minutes (DM) - Industrial minutes (IM) - hundredths of minute (HM - ideal for REFA timestudy) - time measurement unit (1 TMU = 0.036s - for MTM)  - cycles per minute  Features: - lap / split function - automatically saves lap times into list - statistical quantities: average, minimum, maximum - save and load previous time studies - export your saved values into .csv file and share it to evaluate your values with spreadsheet software - no advertising
